title: About
text:
The R User Meet Amsterdam UMC is a programming café where R users of all levels can learn about a new topic, connect with peers, and ask questions.
Meetings are held on the second Wednesday of each month, from 10:00 to 11:00.
Whether you’re a beginner or an expert, everyone is welcome!
Interested in joining? Please contact us via e-mail here.
